name: touchportal_streamraiders
description: Touch Portal and Stream Raiders control

scripts.build-win: pkg --targets node12-win-x64 . && move touchportal_streamraiders.exe base/Win/TPStreamRaiders/ && del Installers\TPStreamRaiders-Win.tpp && cd base\Win && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPStreamRaiders-Win.tpp TPStreamRaiders
scripts.build-mac: pkg --targets node12-macos-x64 . && move touchportal_streamraiders base/Mac/TPStreamRaiders/ && del Installers\TPStreamRaiders-Mac.tpp && cd base\Mac && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPStreamRaiders-Mac.tpp TPStreamRaiders

author: Jameson Allen aka Spdermn02
